Summary: HIGH FLYING SPHERE OVER WESTCHESTER COUNTY PARKWAY,NEW YORK.
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS DRIVING SOUTH ON THE HUTCHINSON RIVER PARKWAY BETWEEN MOUNT VERNON,NEW YORK & THE VILLAGE OF PELHAM, NEW YORK. TRAFFIC WAS HEAVY AND MOVING SLOW. JUST BEFORE GOING UNDER AN OVERPASS I LOOKED UP AND SAW THE SPHERE SPINNING. IT WAS VERY HIGH UP BECAUSE AN AIRPLAIN PASSED UNDER IT GOING SOUTH HEADING TO A NEW YORK AIRPORT. I PASSED UNDER THE OVERPASS AND LOOKED UP AGAIN. THE OBJECT WAS SPINNING AND JUST SHOT STRAIGHT UP AND WAS GONE OUT OF SIGHT. THE PLAIN WAS STILL HEADING SOUTH AT THAT TIME AS WELL.I DID NOT SEE THIS OBJECT AGAIN.I GOT OFF THE PARKWAY AT THE CITY ISLAND EXIT.THAT WAS THE FIRST TIME I EVER SAW ANYTHING LIKE THAT.....
trends: There has been one other sighting in Mt Vernon
There were no other sightings in Mt Vernon on or around September 3rd 2007
